channel.title: Why do moparscape servers have lags?
channel.description: well i want to ask some of you people if you might have the answer why dose moparscape have lags it shouldnt have very much lags on any server like runescape please reply im wondering why its so annoying that servers have it.

item.title: Why do moparscape servers have lags?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well first of all, they arenâ€™t running on actuall servers, most of them are on someones crappy PC.

Second of all, the servers are progammed like crap. The main thread does the updating for every player sequencially. That means before one player can be updated, EVERY SINGLE PLAYER on the server has to be updated as well.

Read full topic
